Page.title: Lever Du?
Page.heroTitle: Is everything okay with your loved ones today?
Page.heroSubtitle: We give you peace of mind in your everyday life. An automatic daily check that notifies you if something is wrong.
Page.dailyCheckInDescription: The elderly person receives an SMS or email at a fixed time every day.
Page.simpleConfirmationDescription: With a single click, they confirm that everything is fine. No login required.
Page.notificationWhenNeededDescription: If they forget to check in, we will notify you as a relative immediately.
Page.whyUseItem1: Simplicity first - designed for the elderly.
Page.whyUseItem3: Peace of mind for relatives who live far away.
Page.whyUseItem4: Affordable insurance for peace of mind.
Page.testimonial: "I was always worried when mom didn't answer the phone. Now I know I'll be notified if something is wrong."
Page.comingSoonSubtitle: We are working hard to finalize the service. Register your email to be notified when we open for new users.
Page.thankYou: Thanks for your interest! We'll keep you updated.
Page.noSpam: We don't send spam, only updates about the launch.
